df-map
blocks.content: Define the mapping operation or set exponentiation. The set of all functions that map from ` B ` to ` A ` is written ` ( A ^m B ) ` (see ~ mapval ). Many authors write ` A ` followed by ` B ` as a superscript for this operation and rely on context to avoid confusion other exponentiation operations (e.g., Definition 10.42 of [TakeutiZaring] p. 95). Other authors show ` B ` as a prefixed superscript, which is read " ` A ` pre ` B ` " (e.g., definition of [Enderton] p. 52). Definition 8.21 of [Eisenberg] p. 125 uses the notation Map( ` B ` , ` A ` ) for our ` ( A ^m B ) ` . The up-arrow is used by Donald Knuth for iterated exponentiation (_Science_ 194, 1235-1242, 1976). We adopt the first case of his notation (simple exponentiation) and subscript it with _m_ to distinguish it from other kinds of exponentiation. (Contributed by NM, 8-Dec-2003.)

blocks.name: df-pm
blocks.content: Define the partial mapping operation. A partial function from ` B ` to ` A ` is a function from a subset of ` B ` to ` A ` . The set of all partial functions from ` B ` to ` A ` is written ` ( A ^pm B ) ` (see ~ pmvalg ). A notation for this operation apparently does not appear in the literature. We use ` ^pm ` to distinguish it from the less general set exponentiation operation ` ^m ` ( ~ df-map ). See ~ mapsspm for its relationship to set exponentiation. (Contributed by NM, 15-Nov-2007.)

blocks.name: mapprc
blocks.content: When ` A ` is a proper class, the class of all functions mapping ` A ` to ` B ` is empty. Exercise 4.41 of [Mendelson] p. 255. (Contributed by NM, 8-Dec-2003.)
blocks.origin:
thm mapprc(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wn(wcel(c0, universe)), wceq(cab(s0, wf(cv(s0), c0, c1)), emptycls))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(wn(wcel(c0, universe)), wceq(cab(s0, wf(cv(s0), c0, c1)), emptycls)), diffsc(s0, c1))
  necon1bi(cab(s0, wf(cv(s0), c0, c1)), emptycls, wcel(c0, universe))
  sylbi(wne(cab(s0, wf(cv(s0), c0, c1)), emptycls), wcel(c0, universe), wex(s0, wf(cv(s0), c0, c1)))
  abn0(s0, wf(cv(s0), c0, c1))
  exlimiv(s0, wf(cv(s0), c0, c1), wcel(c0, universe))
  syl6eqelr(c0, universe, cdm(cv(s0)), wf(cv(s0), c0, c1))
  fdm(cv(s0), c0, c1)
  dmex(cv(s0))
  vex(s0)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, universe)
  diff.universe.s(s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm mapprc(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ (¬ c0 ∈ 𝕌 → { s0 |(s0 : c0 → c1)} = ∅)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
} = {
  a1ii((¬ c0 ∈ 𝕌 → { s0 |(s0 : c0 → c1)} = ∅), d(s0, c1))
  necon1bi({ s0 |(s0 : c0 → c1)}, emptycls, c0 ∈ 𝕌)
  sylbi({ s0 |(s0 : c0 → c1)} ≠ ∅, c0 ∈ 𝕌, ∃(s0,(s0 : c0 → c1)))
  abn0(s0, (s0 : c0 → c1))
  exlimiv(s0, (s0 : c0 → c1), c0 ∈ 𝕌)
  syl6eqelr(c0, universe, dom(s0), (s0 : c0 → c1))
  fdm(s0, c0, c1)
  dmex(s0)
  vex(s0)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, universe)
  diff.universe.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: pmex
blocks.content: The class of all partial functions from one set to another is a set. (Contributed by NM, 15-Nov-2007.)

blocks.name: mapex
blocks.content: The class of all functions mapping one set to another is a set. Remark after Definition 10.24 of [Kunen] p. 31. (Contributed by Raph Levien, 4-Dec-2003.)
blocks.origin:
thm mapex(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wcel(cab(s0, wf(cv(s0), c0, c2)), universe))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
} = {
  sylancr(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wcel(cab(s0, wf(cv(s0), c0, c2)), universe), wss(cab(s0, wf(cv(s0), c0, c2)), cpw(cxp(c0, c2))), wcel(cpw(cxp(c0, c2)), universe))
  sseqtr4i(cab(s0, wf(cv(s0), c0, c2)), cpw(cxp(c0, c2)), cab(s0, wss(cv(s0), cxp(c0, c2))))
  ss2abi(s0, wf(cv(s0), c0, c2), wss(cv(s0), cxp(c0, c2)))
  fssxp(cv(s0), c0, c2)
  df-pw(s0, cxp(c0, c2))
  pwexd(cxp(c0, c2), universe, wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)))
  xpexg(c0, c1, c2, c3)
  ssexg(cab(s0, wf(cv(s0), c0, c2)), cpw(cxp(c0, c2)), universe)
  diff.cxp.s(s0, c0, c2)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm mapex(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ c1 ∧ c2 ∈ c3)→ { s0 |(s0 : c0 → c2)} ∈ 𝕌)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
} = {
  sylancr((c0 ∈ c1 ∧ c2 ∈ c3), { s0 |(s0 : c0 → c2)} ∈ 𝕌, { s0 |(s0 : c0 → c2)} ⊆ P((c0 × c2)), P((c0 × c2))∈ 𝕌)
  sseqtr4i({ s0 |(s0 : c0 → c2)}, P((c0 × c2)), { s0 | s0 ⊆(c0 × c2)})
  ss2abi(s0, (s0 : c0 → c2), s0 ⊆(c0 × c2))
  fssxp(s0, c0, c2)
  df-pw(s0, (c0 × c2))
  pwexd((c0 × c2), universe, (c0 ∈ c1 ∧ c2 ∈ c3))
  xpexg(c0, c1, c2, c3)
  ssexg({ s0 |(s0 : c0 → c2)}, P((c0 × c2)), universe)
  diff.cxp.s(s0, c0, c2)
}

blocks.name: fnmap
blocks.content: Set exponentiation has a universal domain. (Contributed by NM, 8-Dec-2003.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 8-Sep-2013.)
blocks.origin:
thm fnmap() {
  |- wfn(cmap, cxp(universe, universe))
} = {
  fnmpt2i(hs0, hs1, cmap, universe, universe, cab(hs2, wf(cv(hs2), cv(hs1), cv(hs0))))
  df-map(hs0, hs1, hs2)
  el2v(hs1, hs0, wcel(cab(hs2, wf(cv(hs2), cv(hs1), cv(hs0))), universe))
  mapex(hs2, cv(hs1), universe, cv(hs0), universe)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(universe)
  diff.hs1.c(universe)
  diff.hs0.s(hs2)
  diff.hs1.s(hs2)
  diff.hs2.c(cv(hs1))
  diff.hs2.c(cv(hs0))
}

thm fnmap() {

} = {
  fnmpt2i(hs0, hs1, cmap, universe, universe, { hs2 |(hs2 : hs1 → hs0)})

  mapex(hs2, hs1, universe, hs0, universe)

  diff.hs2.c(hs1)

blocks.name: fnpm
blocks.content: Partial function exponentiation has a universal domain. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 14-Nov-2013.)

  fnmpt2i(hs0, hs1, cpm, universe, universe, crab(hs2, cpw(cxp(cv(hs1), cv(hs0))), wfun(cv(hs2))))
  df-pm(hs0, hs1, hs2)
  rabex(hs2, cpw(cxp(cv(hs1), cv(hs0))), wfun(cv(hs2)))
  pwex(cxp(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)))
  xpex(cv(hs1), cv(hs0))
  vex(hs1)
  vex(hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(universe)
  diff.hs1.c(universe)

thm fnpm() {
  ⊢ p↦[Fn](𝕌 × 𝕌)

  diff.hs2.c(P((hs1 × hs0)))
}

blocks.name: mapvalg
blocks.content: The value of set exponentiation. ` ( A ^m B ) ` is the set of all functions that map from ` B ` to ` A ` . Definition 10.24 of [Kunen] p. 24. (Contributed by NM, 8-Dec-2003.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 8-Sep-2013.)
blocks.origin:
thm mapvalg(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {

  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
} = {
  mpd(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wceq(co(c0, cmap, c2), cab(s0, wf(cv(s0), c2, c0))), wcel(cab(s0, wf(cv(s0), c2, c0)), universe))
  ancoms(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(cab(s0, wf(cv(s0), c2, c0)), universe))
  mapex(s0, c2, c3, c0, c1)
  syl2an(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wi(wcel(cab(s0, wf(cv(s0), c2, c0)), universe), wceq(co(c0, cmap, c2), cab(s0, wf(cv(s0), c2, c0)))), wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c2, universe))
  elex(c0, c1)
  elex(c2, c3)
  3expia(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c2, universe), wcel(cab(s0, wf(cv(s0), c2, c0)), universe), wceq(co(c0, cmap, c2), cab(s0, wf(cv(s0), c2, c0))))
  ovmpt2g(hs0, hs1, c0, universe, c2, universe, cab(s0, wf(cv(s0), c2, c0)), universe, cmap, cab(s0, wf(cv(s0), cv(hs1), cv(hs0))), cab(s0, wf(cv(s0), cv(hs1), c0)))
  abbidv(s0, wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wf(cv(s0), cv(hs1), cv(hs0)), wf(cv(s0), cv(hs1), c0))
  feq3(cv(hs0), c0, cv(s0), cv(hs1))
  abbidv(s0, wceq(cv(hs1), c2), wf(cv(s0), cv(hs1), c0), wf(cv(s0), c2, c0))
  feq2(cv(hs1), c2, cv(s0), c0)
  df-map(hs0, hs1, s0)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(universe)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(cab(s0, wf(cv(s0), c2, c0)))
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(universe)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(cab(s0, wf(cv(s0), c2, c0)))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs1), c2)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs1)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs1)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs1.s(s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm mapvalg(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ c1 ∧ c2 ∈ c3)→(c0[↦]c2)= { s0 |(s0 : c2 → c0)})
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
} = {
  mpd((c0 ∈ c1 ∧ c2 ∈ c3), (c0[↦]c2)= { s0 |(s0 : c2 → c0)}, { s0 |(s0 : c2 → c0)} ∈ 𝕌)
  ancoms(c0 ∈ c1, c2 ∈ c3, { s0 |(s0 : c2 → c0)} ∈ 𝕌)
  mapex(s0, c2, c3, c0, c1)
  syl2an(c0 ∈ c1, c2 ∈ c3, ({ s0 |(s0 : c2 → c0)} ∈ 𝕌 →(c0[↦]c2)= { s0 |(s0 : c2 → c0)}), c0 ∈ 𝕌, c2 ∈ 𝕌)
  elex(c0, c1)
  elex(c2, c3)
  3expia(c0 ∈ 𝕌, c2 ∈ 𝕌, { s0 |(s0 : c2 → c0)} ∈ 𝕌, (c0[↦]c2)= { s0 |(s0 : c2 → c0)})
  ovmpt2g(hs0, hs1, c0, universe, c2, universe, { s0 |(s0 : c2 → c0)}, universe, cmap, { s0 |(s0 : hs1 → hs0)}, { s0 |(s0 : hs1 → c0)})
  abbidv(s0, hs0 = c0, (s0 : hs1 → hs0), (s0 : hs1 → c0))
  feq3(hs0, c0, s0, hs1)
  abbidv(s0, hs1 = c2, (s0 : hs1 → c0), (s0 : c2 → c0))
  feq2(hs1, c2, s0, c0)
  df-map(hs0, hs1, s0)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(universe)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c({ s0 |(s0 : c2 → c0)})
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(universe)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c({ s0 |(s0 : c2 → c0)})
  diff.wceq.s(s0, hs0, c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, hs1, c2)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs1)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs1)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs1.s(s0)
}

  sylancr(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wcel(crab(s0, cpw(cxp(c2, c0)), wfun(cv(s0))), universe), wss(crab(s0, cpw(cxp(c2, c0)), wfun(cv(s0))), cpw(cxp(c2, c0))), wcel(cpw(cxp(c2, c0)), universe))
  ssrab2(s0, cpw(cxp(c2, c0)), wfun(cv(s0)))

  elex(c0, c1)
  elex(c2, c3)
  3expia(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c2, universe), wcel(crab(s0, cpw(cxp(c2, c0)), wfun(cv(s0))), universe), wceq(co(c0, cpm, c2), crab(s0, cpw(cxp(c2, c0)), wfun(cv(s0)))))
  ovmpt2g(hs0, hs1, c0, universe, c2, universe, crab(s0, cpw(cxp(c2, c0)), wfun(cv(s0))), universe, cpm, crab(s0, cpw(cxp(cv(hs1), cv(hs0))), wfun(cv(s0))), crab(s0, cpw(cxp(cv(hs1), c0)), wfun(cv(s0))))

  pweqd(cxp(cv(hs1), c0), cxp(c2, c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c2))
  xpeq1(cv(hs1), c2, c0)
  df-pm(hs0, hs1, s0)

thm pmvalg(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ c1 ∧ c2 ∈ c3)→(c0[p↦]c2)= { s0 ∈ P((c2 × c0))| Fun(s0)})
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
} = {
  mpd((c0 ∈ c1 ∧ c2 ∈ c3), (c0[p↦]c2)= { s0 ∈ P((c2 × c0))| Fun(s0)}, { s0 ∈ P((c2 × c0))| Fun(s0)} ∈ 𝕌)
  sylancr((c0 ∈ c1 ∧ c2 ∈ c3), { s0 ∈ P((c2 × c0))| Fun(s0)} ∈ 𝕌, { s0 ∈ P((c2 × c0))| Fun(s0)} ⊆ P((c2 × c0)), P((c2 × c0))∈ 𝕌)
  ssrab2(s0, P((c2 × c0)), Fun(s0))
  pwexd((c2 × c0), universe, (c0 ∈ c1 ∧ c2 ∈ c3))
  ancoms(c0 ∈ c1, c2 ∈ c3, (c2 × c0)∈ 𝕌)
  xpexg(c2, c3, c0, c1)
  ssexg({ s0 ∈ P((c2 × c0))| Fun(s0)}, P((c2 × c0)), universe)
  syl2an(c0 ∈ c1, c2 ∈ c3, ({ s0 ∈ P((c2 × c0))| Fun(s0)} ∈ 𝕌 →(c0[p↦]c2)= { s0 ∈ P((c2 × c0))| Fun(s0)}), c0 ∈ 𝕌, c2 ∈ 𝕌)
  elex(c0, c1)
  elex(c2, c3)
  3expia(c0 ∈ 𝕌, c2 ∈ 𝕌, { s0 ∈ P((c2 × c0))| Fun(s0)} ∈ 𝕌, (c0[p↦]c2)= { s0 ∈ P((c2 × c0))| Fun(s0)})
  ovmpt2g(hs0, hs1, c0, universe, c2, universe, { s0 ∈ P((c2 × c0))| Fun(s0)}, universe, cpm, { s0 ∈ P((hs1 × hs0))| Fun(s0)}, { s0 ∈ P((hs1 × c0))| Fun(s0)})
  rabeqdv(s0, P((hs1 × hs0)), P((hs1 × c0)), hs0 = c0, Fun(s0))
  pweqd((hs1 × hs0), (hs1 × c0), hs0 = c0)
  xpeq2(hs0, c0, hs1)
  rabeqdv(s0, P((hs1 × c0)), P((c2 × c0)), hs1 = c2, Fun(s0))
  pweqd((hs1 × c0), (c2 × c0), hs1 = c2)
  xpeq1(hs1, c2, c0)
  df-pm(hs0, hs1, s0)
  diff.cpw.s(s0, (c2 × c0))
  diff.cxp.s(s0, c2, c0)

}

  inss1(dom(c2), c0)

  3syl((c0 ∈ c1 ∧ c2 ∈(c3[p↦]c4)), (c2 |`(dom(c2)⋂ c0))=(c2 |` c0), (c2 : dom(c2)→ c3), Fun(c2))
  adantl(c0 ∈ c1, c2 ∈(c3[p↦]c4), (c2 : dom(c2)→ c3))
  simpld(c2 ∈(c3[p↦]c4), (c2 : dom(c2)→ c3), dom(c2)⊆ c4)

  3bitr4i(wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, cmap, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), cin(cpw(cxp(c1, c0)), cab(s0, wfn(cv(s0), c1)))), wf(cv(hs0), c1, c0), wa(wss(cv(hs0), cxp(c1, c0)), wfn(cv(hs0), c1)))

  elin(cv(hs0), cpw(cxp(c1, c0)), cab(s0, wfn(cv(s0), c1)))
  anbi12i(wcel(cv(hs0), cpw(cxp(c1, c0))), wcel(cv(hs0), cab(s0, wfn(cv(s0), c1))), wss(cv(hs0), cxp(c1, c0)), wfn(cv(hs0), c1))
  selpw(hs0, cxp(c1, c0))
  elab(s0, cv(hs0), wfn(cv(s0), c1), wfn(cv(hs0), c1))
  vex(hs0)
  fneq1(cv(s0), cv(hs0), c1)
  diff.hs0.c(co(c0, cmap, c1))

thm fvmptmap(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {

  syl5ibr(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cxp(c2, csn(cv(hs0))), co(c0, cmap, c2)), wf(cxp(c2, csn(cv(hs0))), c2, c0))
  fconst6g(cv(hs0), c0, c2)

  sseld(cv(s1), crn(cv(s0)), c0, wf(cv(s0), csn(c1), c0))

  mpbiri(wceq(crn(cv(s0)), csn(cv(s1))), wcel(cv(s1), crn(cv(s0))), wcel(cv(s1), csn(cv(s1))))

  f1osng(c1, c3, cv(s1), universe)
  adantl(w0, wceq(cv(s0), csn(cop(c1, cv(s1)))), wb(wf1o(csn(cop(c1, cv(s1))), csn(c1), csn(cv(s1))), wf1o(cv(s0), csn(c1), csn(cv(s1)))))

blocks.name: map0
blocks.content: Set exponentiation is empty iff the base is empty and the exponent is not empty. Theorem 97 of [Suppes] p. 89. (Contributed by NM, 10-Dec-2003.)

blocks.name: mapsn
blocks.content: The value of set exponentiation with a singleton exponent. Theorem 98 of [Suppes] p. 89. (Contributed by NM, 10-Dec-2003.) (Proof shortened by AV, 17-Jul-2022.)
blocks.origin:
thm mapsn(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wceq(co(c0, cmap, csn(c1)), cab(s0, wrex(s1, c0, wceq(cv(s0), csn(cop(c1, cv(s1)))))))
  -| wcel(c0, universe)
  -| wcel(c1, universe)
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
} = {
  ax-mp(wceq(co(c0, cmap, csn(c1)), cab(s0, wrex(s1, c0, wceq(cv(s0), csn(cop(c1, cv(s1))))))), wcel(c0, universe))
  mapsnd(s0, s1, c0, c1, universe, universe, wcel(c0, universe))
  id(wcel(c0, universe))
  a1i(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c1, universe))
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, universe)
  diff.universe.s(s0)
  diff.wcel.s(s1, c0, universe)
  diff.universe.s(s1)
}

thm mapsn(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ (c0[↦]{ c1 })= { s0 | ∃(s1 ∈ c0, s0 = { < c1, s1 > })}
  ⊣ c0 ∈ 𝕌
  ⊣ c1 ∈ 𝕌
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
} = {
  ax-mp((c0[↦]{ c1 })= { s0 | ∃(s1 ∈ c0, s0 = { < c1, s1 > })}, c0 ∈ 𝕌)
  mapsnd(s0, s1, c0, c1, universe, universe, c0 ∈ 𝕌)
  id(c0 ∈ 𝕌)
  a1i(c0 ∈ 𝕌, c1 ∈ 𝕌)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, universe)
  diff.universe.s(s0)
  diff.wcel.s(s1, c0, universe)
  diff.universe.s(s1)
}

blocks.name: mapss
blocks.content: Subset inheritance for set exponentiation. Theorem 99 of [Suppes] p. 89. (Contributed by NM, 10-Dec-2003.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 26-Apr-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm mapss(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wss(c2, c0)), wss(co(c2, cmap, c3), co(c0, cmap, c3)))
} = {
  ssrdv(hs0, co(c2, cmap, c3), co(c0, cmap, c3), wa(wcel(c0, c1), wss(c2, c0)))
  ex(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wss(c2, c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c2, cmap, c3)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, cmap, c3)))
  mpbird(wa(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wss(c2, c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c2, cmap, c3))), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, cmap, c3)), wf(cv(hs0), c3, c0))
  fssd(cv(hs0), c3, c0, c2, wa(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wss(c2, c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c2, cmap, c3))))
  adantl(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wss(c2, c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c2, cmap, c3)), wf(cv(hs0), c3, c2))
  elmapi(cv(hs0), c2, c3)
  simplr(wcel(c0, c1), wss(c2, c0), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c2, cmap, c3)))
  elmapd(cv(hs0), c0, c3, c1, universe, wa(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wss(c2, c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c2, cmap, c3))))
  simpll(wcel(c0, c1), wss(c2, c0), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c2, cmap, c3)))
  adantl(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wss(c2, c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c2, cmap, c3)), wcel(c3, universe))
  simprd(wcel(cv(hs0), co(c2, cmap, c3)), wcel(c3, universe), wcel(c2, universe))
  elmapex(cv(hs0), c2, c3)
  diff.hs0.c(co(c2, cmap, c3))
  diff.hs0.c(co(c0, cmap, c3))
  diff.hs0.w(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wss(c2, c0)))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm mapss(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ c1 ∧ c2 ⊆ c0)→(c2[↦]c3)⊆(c0[↦]c3))
} = {
  ssrdv(hs0, (c2[↦]c3), (c0[↦]c3), (c0 ∈ c1 ∧ c2 ⊆ c0))
  ex((c0 ∈ c1 ∧ c2 ⊆ c0), hs0 ∈(c2[↦]c3), hs0 ∈(c0[↦]c3))
  mpbird(((c0 ∈ c1 ∧ c2 ⊆ c0)∧ hs0 ∈(c2[↦]c3)), hs0 ∈(c0[↦]c3), (hs0 : c3 → c0))
  fssd(hs0, c3, c0, c2, ((c0 ∈ c1 ∧ c2 ⊆ c0)∧ hs0 ∈(c2[↦]c3)))
  adantl((c0 ∈ c1 ∧ c2 ⊆ c0), hs0 ∈(c2[↦]c3), (hs0 : c3 → c2))
  elmapi(hs0, c2, c3)
  simplr(c0 ∈ c1, c2 ⊆ c0, hs0 ∈(c2[↦]c3))
  elmapd(hs0, c0, c3, c1, universe, ((c0 ∈ c1 ∧ c2 ⊆ c0)∧ hs0 ∈(c2[↦]c3)))
  simpll(c0 ∈ c1, c2 ⊆ c0, hs0 ∈(c2[↦]c3))
  adantl((c0 ∈ c1 ∧ c2 ⊆ c0), hs0 ∈(c2[↦]c3), c3 ∈ 𝕌)
  simprd(hs0 ∈(c2[↦]c3), c3 ∈ 𝕌, c2 ∈ 𝕌)
  elmapex(hs0, c2, c3)
  diff.hs0.c((c2[↦]c3))
  diff.hs0.c((c0[↦]c3))
  diff.hs0.w((c0 ∈ c1 ∧ c2 ⊆ c0))
}

blocks.content: Functionality of the diagonal map. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 24-Jan-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm fdiagfn(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wf(c4, c0, co(c0, cmap, c2)))
  -| wceq(c4, cmpt(s0, c0, cxp(c2, csn(cv(s0)))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
} = {
  fmptd(s0, c4, c0, co(c0, cmap, c2), cxp(c2, csn(cv(s0))), wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)))
  mpbird(wa(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(cxp(c2, csn(cv(s0))), co(c0, cmap, c2)), wf(cxp(c2, csn(cv(s0))), c2, c0))
  adantl(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wcel(cv(s0), c0), wf(cxp(c2, csn(cv(s0))), c2, c0))
  fconst6g(cv(s0), c0, c2)
  adantr(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wcel(cv(s0), c0), wb(wcel(cxp(c2, csn(cv(s0))), co(c0, cmap, c2)), wf(cxp(c2, csn(cv(s0))), c2, c0)))
  elmapg(c0, c1, c2, c3, cxp(c2, csn(cv(s0))))
  diff.co.s(s0, c0, cmap, c2)
  diff.cmap.s(s0)
  diff.wa.s(s0, wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3))
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, c1)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c2, c3)
}

thm fdiagfn(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ c1 ∧ c2 ∈ c3)→(c4 : c0 →(c0[↦]c2)))

  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c3)
} = {

blocks.name: fvdiagfn
blocks.content: Functionality of the diagonal map. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 24-Jan-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm fvdiagfn(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wceq(cfv(c4, c2), cxp(c0, csn(c2))))
  -| wceq(c4, cmpt(s0, c3, cxp(c0, csn(cv(s0)))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wceq(cfv(c4, c2), cxp(c0, csn(c2)))), diffsc(s0, c1))
  fvmptd3(s0, c4, c2, cxp(c0, csn(c2)), c3, cxp(c0, csn(cv(s0))), universe, wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)))
  xpeq2d(c0, csn(cv(s0)), csn(c2), wceq(cv(s0), c2))
  sneq(cv(s0), c2)
  simpr(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3))
  adantr(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(cxp(c0, csn(c2)), universe))
  mpan2(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(cxp(c0, csn(c2)), universe), wcel(csn(c2), universe))
  snex(c2)
  xpexg(c0, c1, csn(c2), universe)
  diff.cxp.s(s0, c0, csn(c2))
  diff.csn.s(s0, c2)

thm fvdiagfn(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ c1 ∧ c2 ∈ c3)→(c4 ` c2)=(c0 × { c2 }))

  eleq1(cv(s0), cfv(cv(s1), c3), c1)
  eqeq2d(cv(s1), cxp(csn(c3), csn(cv(s0))), cxp(csn(c3), csn(cfv(cv(s1), c3))), wceq(cv(s0), cfv(cv(s1), c3)))
  xpeq2d(csn(c3), csn(cv(s0)), csn(cfv(cv(s1), c3)), wceq(cv(s0), cfv(cv(s1), c3)))

  df-mpt(s1, s0, co(c1, cmap, c2), cfv(cv(s1), c3))

blocks.name: mapsnf1o2
blocks.content: Explicit bijection between a set and its singleton functions. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 21-Mar-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm mapsnf1o2(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wf1o(c0, co(c1, cmap, c2), c1)
  -| wceq(c2, csn(c3))
  -| wcel(c1, universe)
  -| wcel(c3, universe)
  -| wceq(c0, cmpt(s0, co(c1, cmap, c2), cfv(cv(s0), c3)))
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
} = {
  mpbir2an(wf1o(c0, co(c1, cmap, c2), c1), wfn(c0, co(c1, cmap, c2)), wfn(ccnv(c0), c1))
  fnmpti(s0, c0, co(c1, cmap, c2), cfv(cv(s0), c3))
  fvex(cv(s0), c3)
  fnmpti(hs0, ccnv(c0), c1, cxp(c2, csn(cv(hs0))))
  xpex(c2, csn(cv(hs0)))
  eqeltri(c2, universe, csn(c3))
  snex(c3)
  snex(cv(hs0))
  mapsncnv(hs0, s0, c0, c1, c2, c3)
  dff1o4(c0, co(c1, cmap, c2), c1)
  diff.co.s(s0, c1, cmap, c2)
  diff.cmap.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm mapsnf1o2(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ⊢ (c0 :(c1[↦]c2)↔ c1)
  ⊣ c2 = { c3 }
  ⊣ c1 ∈ 𝕌
  ⊣ c3 ∈ 𝕌
  ⊣ c0 =(s0 ∈(c1[↦]c2)↦(s0 ` c3))
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
} = {
  mpbir2an((c0 :(c1[↦]c2)↔ c1), c0[Fn](c1[↦]c2), `' c0[Fn]c1)
  fnmpti(s0, c0, (c1[↦]c2), (s0 ` c3))
  fvex(s0, c3)
  fnmpti(hs0, `' c0, c1, (c2 × { hs0 }))
  xpex(c2, { hs0 })
  eqeltri(c2, universe, { c3 })
  snex(c3)
  snex(hs0)
  mapsncnv(hs0, s0, c0, c1, c2, c3)
  dff1o4(c0, (c1[↦]c2), c1)
  diff.co.s(s0, c1, cmap, c2)
  diff.cmap.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
}

blocks.name: mapsnf1o3
blocks.content: Explicit bijection in the reverse of ~ mapsnf1o2 . (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 24-Mar-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm mapsnf1o3(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wf1o(c0, c1, co(c1, cmap, c2))
  -| wceq(c2, csn(c3))
  -| wcel(c1, universe)
  -| wcel(c3, universe)
  -| wceq(c0, cmpt(s0, c1, cxp(c2, csn(cv(s0)))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
} = {
  mpbir(wf1o(c0, c1, co(c1, cmap, c2)), wf1o(ccnv(cmpt(hs0, co(c1, cmap, c2), cfv(cv(hs0), c3))), c1, co(c1, cmap, c2)))
  ax-mp(wf1o(ccnv(cmpt(hs0, co(c1, cmap, c2), cfv(cv(hs0), c3))), c1, co(c1, cmap, c2)), wf1o(cmpt(hs0, co(c1, cmap, c2), cfv(cv(hs0), c3)), co(c1, cmap, c2), c1))
  mapsnf1o2(hs0, cmpt(hs0, co(c1, cmap, c2), cfv(cv(hs0), c3)), c1, c2, c3)
  f1ocnv(cmpt(hs0, co(c1, cmap, c2), cfv(cv(hs0), c3)), co(c1, cmap, c2), c1)
  ax-mp(wb(wf1o(c0, c1, co(c1, cmap, c2)), wf1o(ccnv(cmpt(hs0, co(c1, cmap, c2), cfv(cv(hs0), c3))), c1, co(c1, cmap, c2))), wceq(c0, ccnv(cmpt(hs0, co(c1, cmap, c2), cfv(cv(hs0), c3)))))
  eqtr4i(c0, ccnv(cmpt(hs0, co(c1, cmap, c2), cfv(cv(hs0), c3))), cmpt(s0, c1, cxp(c2, csn(cv(s0)))))
  mapsncnv(s0, hs0, cmpt(hs0, co(c1, cmap, c2), cfv(cv(hs0), c3)), c1, c2, c3)
  eqid(cmpt(hs0, co(c1, cmap, c2), cfv(cv(hs0), c3)))
  f1oeq1(c0, ccnv(cmpt(hs0, co(c1, cmap, c2), cfv(cv(hs0), c3))), c1, co(c1, cmap, c2))
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: ralxpmap
blocks.content: Quantification over functions in terms of quantification over values and punctured functions. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 27-Feb-2015.) (Revised by Stefan O'Rear, 5-May-2015.)

thm ralxpmap(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0, wff w1) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wb(wral(s0, co(c2, cmap, c1), w0), wral(s1, c2, wral(s2, co(c2, cmap, cdif(c1, csn(c0))), w1))))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cun(cv(s2), csn(cop(c0, cv(s1))))), wb(w0, w1))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
